Reviews.Title: Hot Item
Reviews.Author: Graphics Guy
Reviews.Content: This is the second Acer I5 AS5750 laptop that that I received from Amazon. The hard drive on the first burned and crashed within a week.  I called Amazon and they replaced it immediately.  The one I have now is working well but, it has a tendency to heat up quickly when I am multitasking in Photoshop and other large programs. Don't run without a cooler...it's risky.  I personally think laptop manufacturers need to address this flaw.  This is a fast and otherwise well made computer. except for the overheating issue a great buy.  I am also very satisfied with Amazon's service and help.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: KrisK101
Reviews.Content: Since I have gotten it. I haven't had any problems with it. The sound quality is great just as it was advertised to be. I'm still getting to know the laptop so I can't really say much about the features since I haven't used them all. The video quality is great as well I'm watching alot of movies on it ;-)

Reviews.Title: Decent entry level laptop
Reviews.Author: RV
Reviews.Content: Computer is fairly fast and not too much extra bloatware.Overall construction is middle of the road to inexpensive.  I am comparing this to a work laptop, Dell precision - which is 3x the cost, so some of this is to be expected.The case has a bit of flex to it.  Keys have taken some getting use to, I would suggest reviewing it in person before purchasing.Overall, fits my needs as a low cost family PC.  Low level Office items, e-mail, some kid games,etc...

Reviews.Title: Happy with our Acer Laptop
Reviews.Author: Moonglows Mom
Reviews.Content: I would love to give this machine 41/2 stars because I hate the flat keys. They are the most annoying things that laptop manufacturerers have developed in their quest to make laptops thinner and thinner. Give me a fatter laptop with keys curved to fit your finger tips. Otherwise the machine is fast, good display, can take more memory which I may yet install and is great for what I use it for. I only use it for email, research and the online viewing of an occasional missed tv show so can't speak to gaming or graphics intensive applications.  It almost always connected seamlessly to the wireless network in any motel we stayed in. This is the second Acer laptop we have had, and we were happy with the previous one for several years so we looked to Acer for the new one as well.

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Janine Baker
Reviews.Content: This computer is an awesome computer. It took some time getting use to the location of the power button because it is easy to bump while moving it around. So far I have had great luck with it, I use it for school and all my personal information.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: willian
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO VOLVERIA A COMPRAR UNA ACER INSPIRE ES DE LAS MEJORSE ES IMPRESCINDIBLE LA CALIDA DEL PRODUCTO GRACIAS GRACIAS

Reviews.Title: You are my favorite, and remain so always be buying. are excentes
Reviews.Author: Israel
Reviews.Content: It was an excellent experience and they gave me great service (as usual) and all I get as ordered, so continue going in the right direction

Reviews.Title: My first ever Acer and Its just beautiful !
Reviews.Author: Haseeb
Reviews.Content: This is by far the only laptop that i can say was worth buying. My first ever Acer laptop and i am impressed, very impressed... ! I bought the intel core i5 and its super fast and was only 500. My Dell Intel core i3 was 550 and it crashed the very month i purchased it. Now I glad i can play pc games on it and intel hd 3000 isnt that bad if your just going to play some decent games. Dont expect it to run all those high requirements game because you will be disappointed sooner or later. But anyways, the bottom line is if your going to buy, choose the intel core i5. Thank you Amazaon and thank you Acer : ] !

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and price
Reviews.Author: German Dario Ramon
Reviews.Content: the notebook is an ideal, balanced and affordable for use by teenagers in school years. For this reason we suggest with much enthusiasm. My daughter, who has been gracious in receiving the computer, is very happy, and satisfacce all her needs.

Reviews.Title: Quote "this is an entry level laptop"
Reviews.Author: Donald Duck "outta luck"
Reviews.Content: Be wary of those who call it 'entry level' just because of the price. As if you needed a core i5 laptop to check email and surf the web. Wrong. For that even an older Pentium processor will do. In fact that's what netbooks are for. If core i5 is for surfing the web then core i7 (the most powerful on the market) can't be good for much more than medium heavy computer tasks. Let's not mention 4 gb or more of ram.Don't make the mistake and buy this computer just for basic computer tasks. Get a true entry-level laptop for that (around $300) or a tablet, netbook or just use your smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Poor keyboard and touchpad layout
Reviews.Author: thinkingotherthings
Reviews.Content: I returned this computer the day after I received it.  The keys are a bit high above the actual surface of the keyboard so typing is a bit awkward.  Also, the touchpad is the exact same material as the hand resting area on either side, and it is difficult to move your finger because of the friction.  Minor annoyances, but not the kind I'm prepared to deal with on a daily basis.  But apparently no one else was bothered by this, so maybe it's just me.  Amazon was great handling the return.

Reviews.Title: Great for awhile
Reviews.Author: ErnestT
Reviews.Content: We bought this laptop In December 2010, I loved this laptop, it is super fast & everything worked great until....1 1/2 years later the power button quit working,the touchpad quit working & one by one the usb ports have stopped working. All are hardware related problems. As much as I loved this laptop in the beginning iit is a major disappointment.
